name: Raju Nitrogen
wishText: May the nitrogen always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy returns...
text5Entry: Kyuki, tum insaan toh ho nahi 😆
outroText: Iski fees deni ki jarurat nahi hai, bas ek PIZZA 🍕 order kar dena 😁.
replayText: Agar apni bandar si shakal phir se dekhna hai toh yaha click kar lena.
